ing: 2 tart green apples, cored and diced
1 (8 ounce) container frozen whipped topping, thawed
5 (2.1 ounce) bars Baby Ruth â„¢ candy bars, chopped
des: "This is a delicious, dessert salad  that everyone is sure to love, especially chocolate lovers.  It's a very colorful dish made with red, green, and yellow apples."
ins: In a large bowl, combine diced apples, whipped topping, and chopped candy bars.  Mix well.  Serve immediately.
